sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; function App() { const[apidata,setapidata]=useState(); const[tim,settim]=useState(); const[city,setcity]=useState("pune"); const addaction= async()=>{ let url=`https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${city}&units=metric&appid=7f40a7595102633b575991d81ac826cd` const res = await fetch(url); const data = await res.json(); console.log(data); setapidata(data); } let x= setInterval( new Date().toLocaleTimeString(),1000) settim(x) useEffect(()=>{addaction();},[city]); return ( <>
{setcity(e.target.value)}} />
{!apidata ? ( <>
temp
wind
feels like
min
max
sun rise
sun set
Time
): ( <>
{apidata.main.temp}
{apidata.weather[0].main}
Feels Like{apidata.main.feels_like}
Min:{apidata.main.temp_min}
Max:{apidata.main.temp_max}
sun rise
sun set
Local Time : {}
) }
); } export default App;
